2+1.sig_info: Once per fight when the Phoenix is struck by a blow that would knock her out, she immediately becomes invulnerable for 2 seconds, and consumes all of her Phoenix Force charges, regaining 39.31 to 93.51 Health per charge. After which she gains 1 Phoenix Force charges.

PHOENIX FORCE - PASSIVE: The Phoenix’s connection to the cosmic Phoenix Force entity is the source of much of her power. She begins the fight with 1 Phoenix Force charge, and periodically generates Fury Buffs based on her current number of Phoenix Force charges.
Fury Buffs increase Attack by 10.13.
EMPOWERED - 5 OR MORE FURY BUFFS: All attacks gain 100% chance to Incinerate the opponent, dealing 7.5 Energy Damage over 6 seconds. This effect also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% while it's active.
Heavy Attacks gain 100% chance to Armor Break, reducing Armor Rating by 533.33 for 10 seconds
OVERLOADED - 11 FURY BUFFS: On entering Overload all Phoenix Force charges are immediately consumed, and the Phoenix begins to consume Fury Buffs periodically.
All attacks have a 25% chance to Stun Incinerated targets.
Combat Power Rate is reduced by 80%.
On reaching 0 Fury Charges the Phoenix stops Overloading and generates 1 Phoenix Force charge.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to gain a Phoenix Force Buff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain 10% Power for each Phoenix Force charge, consuming all but 1 of them.
Consumes up to 1 Fury Buffs, increasing Special Damage by 10% per Fury consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Gain 3 additional stacks of Phoenix Force.
Consumes up to 4 Fury Buffs, increasing Special Damage by 10% per Fury consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: This attack consumes all of the Phoenix's Fury Buffs, granting up to a 240% damage bonus based on the number of Fury Buffs consumed.

Combat Power Rate is reduced by 80%.
On reaching 0 Fury Charges the Phoenix stops Overloading and generates 1 Phoenix Force charge.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to gain a Phoenix Force Buff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain 10% Power for each Phoenix Force charge, consuming all but 1 of them.
Consumes up to 1 Fury Buffs, increasing Special Damage by 10% per Fury consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Gain 3 additional stacks of Phoenix Force.
Consumes up to 4 Fury Buffs, increasing Special Damage by 10% per Fury consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: This attack consumes all of the Phoenix's Fury Buffs, granting up to a 240% damage bonus based on the number of Fury Buffs consumed.

6+2.sig_info: Once per fight when the Phoenix is struck by a blow that would knock her out, she immediately becomes invulnerable for 2 seconds, and consumes all of her Phoenix Force charges, regaining 1765.39 to 4382.4 Health per charge. After which she gains 1 Phoenix Force charges.

PHOENIX FORCE - PASSIVE: The Phoenix’s connection to the cosmic Phoenix Force entity is the source of much of her power. She begins the fight with 1 Phoenix Force charge, and periodically generates Fury Buffs based on her current number of Phoenix Force charges.
Fury Buffs increase Attack by 307.67.
EMPOWERED - 5 OR MORE FURY BUFFS: All attacks gain 100% chance to Incinerate the opponent, dealing 227.9 Energy Damage over 6 seconds. This effect also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% while it's active.
Heavy Attacks gain 100% chance to Armor Break, reducing Armor Rating by 700 for 10 seconds
